channel.title: Making a minigame
channel.description: i have tried several times i want to make a shade minigame i had one all set up on dragzscape with the teleports and everything drops and all working but when i used the key on the chest it did not dissapear i kept the key and i got the item im having a serious problem trying to fix that can someone please help me im now using a deltascape source if that helps at all

item.title: Making a minigame
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

Ok, this is a very simple procedure. Iâ€™ll walk you through it step by step.

  1. Find out the objects ID and the Keys ID.
  2. Next open Client.java
  3. Press CTRL + F
  4. You should see a search box.
  5. Type: if (objectID
  6. Underneath the last bracket of a code, add this:

if(UsedOnObjectID == CHESTID && ItemID == ITEMID && playerHasItem(ITEMID) { deleteItem(KEYID, AMOUNT); sM("Remove this line if don't want text, otherwise, TEXT HERE."); addItem(ITEMID, AMOUNT); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); }

Read full topic
